```{r}
rw_data <- read.csv("./data/ReefWatch_new_all_TRUSTED.csv")
head(rw_data)
tail(rw_data)
rw_tempo_sort <- rw_data[order(as.Date(rw_data$survey_date, format="%d/%m/%Y")),]
```

Fish species first
```{r}
library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(scales)

rw_fish <- rw_tempo_sort[rw_tempo_sort$species_type=="Fish Species",]
rw_fish$drange1
rw_fish$Date <- as.Date(rw_fish$survey_date)
rw_fish$date_num <- as.numeric(rw_fish$Date)
```
